summary:
i made an new weapon out of the original glass sword data.
i has an recipe, enchantment and can be inproved!
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS MY FIRST MOD!!! :D

i made an new weapon out of the original glass sword data and named it The Frost.
it has an recipe, enchantment and can be inproved!

becouse i dont know how there wont be: An picture of it unless somewane want to makes one.
An Retexture unless i learn how.

U dont need an DLC or MOD to run this just install!
if u have an idea,reaction,... please post it in the comments!

Srry if my eng is bad!
author: thegameviewerX
